hero.tagline: Delivering reliability through smart facility management.
hero.quote: A trusted saudi brand delivering facility management, maintenance, office, ground, and accommodation services for safe, efficient, sustainable operations.

visionMission.title: Vision, mission & core values!
visionMission.description: At MACC FM, we believe that success is never a coincidence – it's built on a clear vision, a steadfast mission, and strong values that form the foundation of every achievement we make.
visionMission.visionText: We power the kingdom's growth by managing facilities that people love to use comfortable, reliable and ready for tomorrow.

items.title: SAFEGUARD PEOPLE AND REPUTATION
items.description: Adhere strictly to a zero-harm philosophy and maintain full compliance with osha, nfpa, ashrae, and iso 9001/14001/45001 standards.

items.title: ENSURE ENGINEER AVAILABILITY
items.description: Implement reliability-focused and predictive maintenance strategies to prevent equipment failures and maximize lifecycle performance.

items.title: ENHANCE STAKEHOLDER EXPERIENCE
items.description: Deliver premium-level services and maintain immaculate environments, conducting operations discreetly for all stakeholders.

items.title: ADHERE TO INTERNATIONAL STANDARDS
items.description: Operate in alignment with iso 41001 (facility management) and iso 55001 (asset management), underpinned by audited slas and kpis.

items.title: ADVANCE DECARBONISATION EFFORTS
items.description: Achieve measurable reductions in energy use, water consumption and waste generation; prioritise sustainable procurement and materials selection.

items.title: ACCELERATE DIGITAL INTEGRATION
items.description: Utilise integrated bms, cafm and iot systems, supported by clear dashboards that transform data into actionable insights.

items.title: BUILD SAUDI CAPABILITY
items.description: Cultivate local talent and leadership while embedding global best practices throughout operations.

items.title: MAINTAIN READINESS AT ALL TIMES
items.description: Provide 24/7 response capabilities, employ crisis-tested procedures and ensure robust business-continuity measures.

values.title: Mastery.
values.description: Craftsmanship and certified technical excellence that you can feel.

values.title: Accountability.
values.description: We own outcomes end to end: promise, measure, report, improve.

values.title: Continuous improvement.
values.description: Learn fast, fix fast, raise the bar.

values.title: Confidentiality & integrity.
values.description: Discretion as default; ethical, compliant and audit ready.

values.title: Future ready.
values.description: Digital, data led and focused to meet tomorrow's demands.

values.title: Measured impact.
values.description: Transparent slas, kpis and tco/lca thinking that link spend to value.

certifications.title: Our Accreditations & Certifications !
certifications.description: Our certifications reflect our commitment to quality, safety, and international standards across all operations.

achievements.title: Our achievements
achievements.subtitle: In numbers!
achievements.description: Over the years, MACC FM has earned the trust of leading clients by maintaining high standards and exceptional service quality.

hero.subtitle: From government entities to private corporations — MACC FM proudly serves diverse sectors with excellence.

section.title:
Our
clients !
section.description: At MACC FM, we proudly uphold top international standards in quality, safety, and operational excellence — our accreditations stand as proof of our dedication to improvement and trusted partnerships.

hero.description: At modern architecture contracting company (MACC FM), we believe our people are the foundation of our success. we are committed to building a diverse, innovative, and collaborative work environment where talent is recognized and growth is continuous. whether you're starting your career or looking to take the next step, MACC FM offers exciting opportunities across various fields in facility management, engineering, operations, and support services. join us and be part of shaping the future of integrated solutions in the kingdom and beyond.

cta.title: Join our team !
cta.description: At MACC FM, we welcome professionals who share our passion for excellence and reliability. fill out the form below and take the first step towards your future with us.
cta.bottomText: Your next opportunity starts here — apply with confidence!

0.question: What services does macc-fm provide?
0.answer: Macc-fm provides comprehensive facility management services including hvac maintenance, electrical services, plumbing, cleaning, security, and integrated facility solutions for commercial, industrial, and residential properties.

1.question: Can you manage large-scale corporate facilities?
1.answer: Absolutely. we specialize in handling large office buildings, industrial facilities, and residential compounds with professional management and efficiency.

2.question: Do you provide customized solutions for clients?
2.answer: Yes, we provide tailored facility management solutions based on each client's specific needs and requirements.

3.question: How can i request your services?
3.answer: You can request our services by contacting us through our website, phone, or email. our team will respond promptly to discuss your requirements.

4.question: How do you ensure quality and reliability?
4.answer: We ensure quality through certified professionals, regular training, quality control processes, and adherence to international standards.
